meanings.sent1: She enjoys technicalizing her computer setup to make it more efficient.
meanings.sent2: The engineers are technicalizing the new software to ensure it runs smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The students technicalizing their science project accidentally turned it into a robot!
meanings.sent4: His passion for technicalizing everything around him turned his house into a high-tech wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The artist technicalizing her painting process created stunning digital artworks.

meanings.definition: To focus on technical details or aspects.
meanings.sent1: The professor is technicalizing the importance of precision in scientific experiments.
meanings.sent2: When technicalizing a project, it's crucial to pay attention to every small detail.
meanings.sent3: The team technicalizing the car design ended up adding rocket boosters by mistake!
meanings.sent4: By technicalizing his approach to cooking, he turned simple recipes into gourmet dishes.
meanings.sent5: She was technicalizing the code so intensely that she didn't notice the time passing by.
